name: Conversations With Them
description:
CONTENT WARNING: This game features discussions of depression, suicidal thoughts and self-harm

・・・・・

Conversations With Them is an interactive story documenting a conversation between You and The Guy, a once ever-present fixture in You's life who suddenly reappears after six years following their recent move to live in Tokyo, Japan. Their sudden return forces You to confront their past, and take a first step into an uncertain future.

This conversation takes place on a walk between Shibuya and Shinjuku, as the pair frankly discuss their shared experiences, anxieties, depression, suicidal thoughts, and the cyclical battles necessary to keep such thoughts at bay. 

・・・・・

FEATURES:

-An interactive story with multiple choices influencing the events and conversations between You and The Guy

-Tokyo brought to life through real-world candid photography documenting their journey through the city

-HEADPHONES RECOMMENDED: Listen to the real sounds of Tokyo and an original theme song, Goodbye
